author: andreas
content: The funny thing is, it was meant as HDR, I did my five exposures, but as this is not the Nikon, I made the exposures manually. No problem with the POV, the camera was rested fairly stable, but I just didn't anticipate how fast the clouds would move. No chance for an automatic merge to HDR. Instead I had to use the good old layers-and.masks method ðŸ™‚
